abstract: Citigroup has recruited a top equity derivatives salesman away from Morgan Stanley, offering him a guaranteed bonus to join the embattled bank, Forbes.com reports.
snippet: Citigroup has recruited a top equity derivatives salesman away from Morgan Stanley, offering him a guaranteed bonus to join the embattled bank, Forbes.com reports.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup has wooed a top equity derivatives salesman away from Morgan Stanley, offering him a guaranteed bonus to join the embattled bank, Forbes.com reports.

headline.main: Citi Is Said to Hire Morgan Stanley Managing Director
